attributes.action: Open a centre where women of all ages can learn self defense for free.
attributes.additional_details:
Women live constantly with the fear that something terrible can happen to them, they are more at risk than anybody to become victims of rape or assault and are not really trained to defend themselves.
It affects their confidence.
As a woman you shouldn't constantly have to be forced to live with this fear on a daily basis.
attributes.background: I want the government to provide women with a centre all across London where they can learn to defend themselves as a means of keeping themselves safe from harm free of any cost that most Londoners cannot afford to pay for.
